title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When deleting a working set, the package view in the background refilters. This refiltering occurs immediately upon deletion, rather than when closing the working set selection dialog.
EB: The package view should only refilter when closing the working set selection dialog, not when deleting a working set. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to working sets, including canceling the removal of a working set.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set. Delete the first working set.
